headTitle: ICRAFT | Web Design Company - Contact | Auckland
headDescription: ICRAFT Would love to hear about what you've got in mind. For more information or a FREE quote, contact us about our web design, graphic design and IT solution services.
jumbotronSubTitle: For a free quote, audit or general question. Here's how you can reach us.
heading1: Got a question or want to know more? fill out the form or flick us a email or phone call.
headingText1: If you're after a free quote or audit, just fill out the form with your details and we'll be in touch within a couple days.
